desc:
From the book **Hip Licks Volume 1**, work on the** @type **lick in** @key**. 
 If time, work on 3 keys, following the cycle of fifths
@type: ii mi7 / V7 / I Maj7 (two bar phrases on page 16)
ii mi7b5 / V7 / I mi (two bar phrases on page 21)
parallel Maj7 to mi7 (two bar phrases on page 22)
ii mi7 / V7 / I Maj7 (four bar phrases on page 26)
ii mi7b5 / V7 / I mi (four bar phrases on page 34)
ii mi7 / V7 / I Maj7 (with moving 7ths on page 36)
